title: can't connect after champ selection
body: After going through champion selection, the gameplay client starts and it is only a black screen (not the typical loading screen like with champion matchups). It then says the "you have been disconnected, try to reconnect" I try and it still fails. I have reinstalled the program, installed the new beta, and even did the complete troubleshooting sweep. It also does not work vs. AI.  I am now on low priority and am begging for a fix.

replies.body:
It sounds like there could be an issue between your PC and the gameservers you're trying to reach. Since this issue is typically impacted by a *poor connection* to the servers, I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Please let me know if those steps resolve this for you.
Yep I am having the same issue
